question: Who has been appointed the new brand ambassador of the Srinagar Municipal Corporation (SMC)?
explanation: Bilal Dar (18),  an 18-year-old ragpicker of Laharwarpora in Bandipora district,  has been appointed the new brand ambassador of the Srinagar Municipal Corporation (SMC). He has been earning his livelihood by cleaning the Wular Lake and removing garbage, used bottles and shoes among other things for almost 5 years now and is an inspiration for everybody. Dar will get a special uniform and vehicle to go and meet people and sensitize them about environmental issues, cleanliness and garbage disposal.
